returns._0: address The address of the currently configured governance.

params.revokedAddress: The address to revoke the emergency admin role from.

params.newEmergencyAdmin: The new emergency admin address to set.

params.newGovernance: The new governance address to set.

getGovernance().notice: Returns the currently configured governance address.

revokeEmergencyAdmin(address).notice: Revokes the emergency admin role from a specified address.

setEmergencyAdmin(address).notice: Sets the emergency admin, which is a permissioned role able to set the protocol state.
